itunes:title: Finding Your Process as a Debut Author
title: Finding Your Process as a Debut Author
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with award winning author, playwright, screenwriter and journalist, Byron Lane — author of the acclaimed A Star is Bored  (which was inspired in part by Byron's time as assistant to beloved actress Carrie Fisher) — about finding your process as a debut author; getting help when you need it; learning your craft; and mining tough times in your life for fictional gold.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with award winning author, playwright, screenwriter and journalist, Byron Lane — author of the acclaimed A Star is Bored  (which was inspired in part by Byron's time as assistant to beloved actress Carrie Fisher) — about finding your process as a debut author; getting help when you need it; learning your craft; and mining tough times in your life for fictional gold.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Byron Lane
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Byron Lane, A Star is Bored, Carrie Fisher, Publishing, debut author, writing process, writing advice
